root.name: PQ: Practical Intelligence Quotient
root.description: PQ is a game that not only tests, but improves your Practical Intelligence Quotient. The PQ is your logic and reasoning, as opposed to the IQ which is general intelligence. Throughout the game's 100 puzzles, you will be set as a glowing-white male who's only objective is to get through the level to exit the door. To do this you must solve the various puzzles consisting of stairs, spinning doors, and even policemen with flashlights. At the end of the game, you will get your PQ, which is derived of the time it took and other factors, and you will then be compared to other players from the world to see where you stand.
